titles.title: Community Association Reporting Exemption Act
Community Association Reporting Exemption Act
To amend title 31, United States Code, to exempt entities subject to taxation under section 528 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 from certain beneficial ownership reporting requirements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Community Association Reporting Exemption Act
This bill exempts certain tax-exempt homeowners associations from beneficial ownership information reporting requirements.
